name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 84: The Boku ni Oma Cafe - Kimagure Strawberry Cafe
summary:
In Kimagure Strawberry Cafe you play as Ichigo Mizuhara (default name) and your luck left you when your parents suddenly decide to have a trip for a whole year. Things couldn't get any worse, now you are in charge of a cafe that your parents left you. Well things aren't so bad when you have a childhood friend and your cute underclassmen to help you run the cafe. And who say lady luck just left you, when now suddenly you are stranded to manage the cafe with 5 cute guys.

During each week the player decide what he wants Ichigo to do, she can study, do research, work in the cafe (making new cakes, talking to the waiters, decide the waiter's work, etc.), go around the town. In some days of the months there will be special events (such exams, sports competitions, etc) and in those times the player will be given different choices and as usual depending of the choices the images and the endings will be different. Doing different activities will make Ichigo stats improve in a way or another.
